import React,{useState, useContext, useEffect} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../context/auth/authContext' const Register = () => { const authContext = useContext(AuthContext); const [user, setUser] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', password2:'' }) const { name, email, password, password2 } = user; const onChange = e => setUser({...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); const onSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log("User Registered") } return (

User Registration

) } export default Register
